statements: UPDATE predictive_maintenance_models SET maintenance_required = TRUE WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:00:00';

UPDATE predictive_maintenance_models SET sensor_data = 'Updated Data', maintenance_required = false WHERE equipment_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2022-01-15';
